description: Try our easy to follow Rump Steaks - Sticky Asian-Flavoured Rub recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rump Steaks - Sticky Asian-Flavoured Rub Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place steaks in a ceramic dish in a single layer. Add rub and evenly coat both sides of the steaks. Cook steaks on a preheated barbecue plate for 3-4 minutes on each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking.
